twoSetSkill.name: Foe of Industrialists 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Basic, Combo, and Charged ATKs deal 20.0% bonus Physical DMG and an additional 15.0% bonus Physical DMG against MECH enemies. Casting Ultimate boosts Total DMG of Basic, Combo, and Charged ATKs by 20.0% for 8s. Can be refreshed

threeSetSkill.name: Social Truth 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Casting Ultimate reduces Total DMG taken by 30.0% and improves Ignore Interrupt for 8s. When equipped by the Olenyevas, charges of an individual stigmata start at 5 and max at 8. The starting charge bonus can proc once every 10 min in Open World.
